    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void changeFlag()
      When button is right clicked, this method is run.
      void checkButton(int x, int y, boolean first)
      Checks to see the button is flagged.
      If flagged nothing happens
      Otherwise, disables button, sets icon to the number value of the button,
      sets the disabled icon to the number value too and if the number is zero it reruns the sweep method from MineSweeperGame
      void createIconList()
      Creates the icon list with the bufferedImages from buffList[]
      boolean flagged()
      Returns true of the button is flagged and false if it is not
      boolean getIsClicked()
      Returns true if the button was clicked and false if the button wasn't clicked
      boolean isMine()
      Checks to see if button is a mine
      void openMine()
      If the tile is a mine, disables it, changes the icon to a mine and changes the disabled icon to a mine
      void openTile()
      Opens the tile.
      void setTile()
      Sets the button to the tile icon

    • Constructor Detail

      • GameButton

        public GameButton(int side,
                  int x,
                  int y,
                  boolean Mine,
                  int num)
        Constructor of GameButton that sets the location, size, defines if its a mine, adds mouse listener and sets the icon to a tile
        Parameters:
        side - size of sides
        x - x location
        y - y location
        Mine - true if mine, false if not a mine
        num - number value of tile

    • Method Detail

      • setTile

        public void setTile()
        Sets the button to the tile icon

      • isMine

        public boolean isMine()
        Checks to see if button is a mine
        Returns:
        true if button is a mine and false if its not

      • changeFlag

        public void changeFlag()
        When button is right clicked, this method is run. It checks to see if the button is already flagged
        and flags it or unflags it based on its previous state.
        If button is flagged and is a mine, decreases numMinesLeft in MineSweeperGame and runs the wingame method to see if the player won

      • flagged

        public boolean flagged()
        Returns true of the button is flagged and false if it is not
        Returns:
        true if flagged and false if not

      • checkButton

        public void checkButton(int x,
                        int y,
                        boolean first)
        Checks to see the button is flagged.
        If flagged nothing happens
        Otherwise, disables button, sets icon to the number value of the button,
        sets the disabled icon to the number value too and if the number is zero it reruns the sweep method from MineSweeperGame
        Parameters:
        x - x location
        y - y location
        first - true if its the first button checkButton() is called on in a sweep, false if its not

      • getIsClicked

        public boolean getIsClicked()
        Returns true if the button was clicked and false if the button wasn't clicked
        Returns:
        true if the button was clicked and false if the button wasn't clicked

      • openMine

        public void openMine()
        If the tile is a mine, disables it, changes the icon to a mine and changes the disabled icon to a mine

      • openTile

        public void openTile()
        Opens the tile. If its a mine, run openMine() and loseGame() from MineSweeperGame
        If it isnt a mine, disables button, changes the icon to the number and the disabled icon to the number and runs the sweep method at the buttons coordinates

      • createIconList

        public void createIconList()
        Creates the icon list with the bufferedImages from buffList[]
